trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="<cookieHandler>" /> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento de configuração <see langword="<cookieHandler>" />.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is a child element of the `<federatedAuthentication>` element; the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is set to an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement> class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` é um elemento filho do `<federatedAuthentication>` elemento; o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade é definida como uma instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is used to configure the cookie handler used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM), which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: O `<cookieHandler>` elemento é usado para configurar o manipulador de cookie usado por sessão de autenticação do módulo (SAM), que é representado pela <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> classe.

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler can be configured in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de cookie pode ser configurado em uma das seguintes maneiras:

trans-unit.source: To configure a chunked cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element for your chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um manipulador de cookie em partes, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked> e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> propriedade com o elemento de configuração para o manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> propriedade não deve ser definida.

trans-unit.source: To configure a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size, you can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property as mentioned earlier, but leave both the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> properties unset.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um manipulador de cookie em partes com o tamanho da parte padrão, você pode definir o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade conforme mencionado anteriormente, mas deixe ambos o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> propriedades não definidas.

trans-unit.source: To configure a custom cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element that identifies the type of your custom cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Para configurar um manipulador de cookie personalizado, defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom> e defina o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> propriedade com o elemento de configuração que identifica o tipo do seu manipulador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo deve derivar do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> propriedade não deve ser definida.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement" /> that provides additional configuration for the chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement" /> que fornece configuração adicional para o manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<chunkedCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é equivalente a `<chunkedCookieHandler>` elemento filho do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a chunked cookie handler, an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> class, to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um manipulador de cookie em partes, uma instância do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> classe a ser usada.

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked>.
trans-unit.target: Se for definido, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property is set to either of these values but the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property is not set, a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=nameWithType>) is configured.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade estiver definida para qualquer um desses valores, mas o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> propriedade não for definido, um manipulador de cookie em partes com o tamanho da parte padrão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=nameWithType>) está configurado.

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> propriedade pode ser conjunto, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set when a custom cookie handler is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade deve ser definida quando um manipulador de cookie personalizado está sendo configurado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement" /> that defines the custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement" /> que define o tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<customCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade é equivalente a `<customCookieHandler>` elemento filho do `<cookieHandler>` elemento.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a custom cookie handler type to use.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um tipo de manipulador de cookie personalizado para usar.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade for definida, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> propriedade deve ser definida como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom>.

trans-unit.source: The custom type specified by this property must be derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: O tipo personalizado especificado por essa propriedade deve ser derivado de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> classe.

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> propriedade ou o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> propriedade pode ser conjunto, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor de domínio para os cookies gravados pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The domain value.
trans-unit.target: O valor de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `domain` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `domain` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new cookie handler based on the configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um novo manipulador de cookie com base nas propriedades de configuração.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler" /> or <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler" /> depending on the kind of handler that is configured by the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Essa será uma instância de <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler" /> ou <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler" /> dependendo do tipo de manipulador que é configurado com as propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a cookie handler that is consistent with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Esse método retorna um manipulador de cookie que é consistente com a configuração.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler returned will be either a chunked cookie handler or a custom cookie handler depending on how the configuration properties are set.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador de cookie retornado será um manipulador de cookie em partes ou um manipulador de cookie personalizado dependendo de como configurar as propriedades de configuração.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler cannot be created from the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de cookie não pode ser criado com base nas propriedades da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see langword="httpOnly" /> property of the cookies written by this handler should be set.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se a propriedade <see langword="httpOnly" /> dos cookies gravados por esse manipulador deve ser definida.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see langword="httpOnly" /> property should be set; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see langword="httpOnly" /> propriedade deve ser definida; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the "HttpOnly" flag is emitted for any cookies written.
trans-unit.target: Controla se o sinalizador "HttpOnly" é emitido para qualquer cookie gravado.

trans-unit.source: Certain Web browsers honor this flag by keeping client-side script from accessing the cookie value.
trans-unit.target: Alguns navegadores da Web aceitam esse sinalizador, mantendo o script do lado do cliente acessem o valor do cookie.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `hideFromScript` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `hideFromScript` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo de manipulador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: A valid <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode" /> value that indicates the kind of cookie handler that is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Uma opção válida <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode" /> valor que indica o tipo de manipulador de cookie que está sendo configurado.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default" />, which indicates a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default" />, que indica que um manipulador de cookie em partes.

trans-unit.source: For chunked cookie handlers (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property is set), the mode should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default>.
trans-unit.target: Para manipuladores de cookie em partes (o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> estiver definida), o modo deve ser definido para <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Chunked> ou <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Default>.

trans-unit.source: For a custom cookie handler (the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property is set), the mode should be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: Para um manipulador de cookie personalizado (o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> estiver definida), o modo deve ser definido como <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode.Custom>.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `mode` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `mode` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for any cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome base dos cookies gravados pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: The base name for the cookies.
trans-unit.target: O nome de base para os cookies.

trans-unit.source: The default is "FedAuth".
trans-unit.target: O padrão é "FedAuth".

trans-unit.source: Represents the `name` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `name` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o valor do caminho dos cookies gravados pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho.

trans-unit.source: If no path is defined, the path defined by the <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A> property is used.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum caminho for definido, o caminho definido pelo <xref:System.Web.HttpRuntime.AppDomainAppVirtualPath%2A> propriedade é usada.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `path` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `path` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of cookies issued by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tempo de vida dos cookies emitidos pelo manipulador.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that represents the cookie lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que representa o tempo de vida do cookie.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 days ("0.0:0:0").
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 0 dias ("0.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: The value must be a value between 0 ("0.0:0:0") and 365 ("365.0:0:0") days.
trans-unit.target: O valor deve ser um valor entre 0 ("0.0:0:0") e 365 dias ("365.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: Represents the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `persistentSessionLifetime` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se o cookie deve ser usado somente com SSL.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o cookie precisar ser usado apenas em uma conexão SSL; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the "Secure" flag is emitted for any cookies written.
trans-unit.target: Controla se o sinalizador "Secure" é emitido para qualquer cookie gravado.

trans-unit.source: If this value is `true`, the sign-in session cookies will only be available over HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: Se esse valor for `true`, os cookies de sessão de entrada só estará disponíveis via HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `requireSSL` attribute of the [<cookieHandler>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representa o `requireSSL` atributo o [ <cookieHandler> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/cookiehandler.md) elemento.
